thread.title: Spread of mobiles not enough for women empowerment
thread.title_full: Spread of mobiles not enough for women empowerment

title: Spread of mobiles not enough for women empowerment
text:
Spread of mobiles not enough for women empowerment 
Times Of India Sunday 25th October, 2015 
• Dramtic spread of mobiles not enough to empower women, says a study. 
• Among active internet users, it is less likely that women would use net to increase income. 
• Govt committed towards digital skills for everyone for wider access to quality education....
